hanzi-su-wiki:
締

Значения

Затягивать, завязывать, душить, экономить, закрывать; быть сжатым, быть бережливым, быть закрытым; заключать

Мнемоника

Узы 弃 императоров 帝, союз государей. Крепко связывать, договор, тесная связь.

Варианты

缔
purpleculture_pinyin:
dì
closely joined; connection; knot
тесно связаны; связь; морской узел
rtega_mnemonic:
締締RS
缔缔		tie, join, connect, connection, shut, lock
  • strings 糸 of power of the supreme ruler 帝: ties the mouth of his subjects or locks them behind bars resulting in the people joining in bringing him down
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 缔)
Pictophonetic: 帝 indicates the sound; 糹 (thread) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
締結 [ dì jié ]: to conclude (an agreement)
締造 [ dì zào ]: to found; to create
締約國 [ dì yuē guó ]: signatory states; countries that are party to a treaty
締約 [ dì yuē ]: to conclude a treaty
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 糹 [ sī ] silk; thread
    • 帝 [ dì ] supreme ruler, emperor; god
heisig_chinese_memo: Spiderman managed to get behind the sovereign and tightened a web around the sovereign's throat. As long as the sovereign says what spidey whispers, he will be fine. Sovereign yelping : ' we will draw are troops back! and we will spend more money on healthcare, schools and less on wars!' Spidey whispering: 'To conclude, if you continue at this pace, you might be doing good things AND the people will like you.'.
heisig_constituent: tighten, thread, spiderman, sovereign, vase, stand up, apron, crown, towel
koohiiStory1: The sovereign appears to be ruling, but in reality someone behind him (for instance his wife) has a thread around his throat, and if he dares to make a decision she doesn´t like, she starts pulling the thread and tightens it around his throat.
koohiiStory2: (astridtops) Spiderman managed to get behind the sovereign. (pick your favourite nowadays country ruler who isn´t doing a good job). Spidey has tightend a web around the sovereing´s throat. As long as the sovereign says what spidey whispers, he will be fine. Sovereign yelping : ´ we will draw are troops back! and we will spend more money on healthcare, schools and less on wars!´ Spidey whispering: ´ If you continue at this pace, you might be doing good things AND the people will like you.´.
kunYomi: し.まる、し.まり、し.める、-し.め、-じ.め
jp_example_words:
締め切り(しめきり): closing, cut-off, end, deadline, Closed, No Entrance
戸締り(とじまり): closing up, fastening the doors
取り締まり(とりしまり): control, management, supervision
取り締まる(とりしまる): to manage, to control, to supervise
締切(しめきり): closing, cut-off, end, deadline, Closed, No Entrance
締め切る(しめきる): shut up
締める(しめる): to tie, fasten
jp_readingExamples: 締まる (し.まる), 締める (し.める)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You have a special thread in your towel you can use to make it stand up by tightening it.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine pulling this thread and watch as your towel tightens and goes rigid, standing up almost completely on its own (except that the thread did it).
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You tighten your towel before you eat tater (てい) tots every night. That way it stands up nice and straight next to your eating chair, ready for all that delicious tater tot grease that gets on your fingers.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: A tightened towel stands up for easy grease cleanup. No wiping on your pants, no dripping on the floor.
Ru_Radicals: 亠 (крышка), 并, 冖 (ва), 小 (маленький), 巾 (тряпка), 幺 (короткая нить), 立 (стоять), 糸 (нить)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the sovereign (帝) uses the thread (糸) to close (the rip)
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: To conclude the newest season of Spiderman here we see Spidey tighten a thread around the evil sovereign's neck.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of "糸" and " di ", the original meaning is that the knot cannot be solved. " Confidential " is not seen in Jia Jinwen, "Shu Wen":

"The knot is incomprehensible. From Shito, the emperor's voice." Duan Yucai's note: "The one who solves, the sentence is also. The following said: "New, knot and unsolvable." Therefore, the knot is insoluble, so it is concluded."

" Dissociation " can be extended to mean depression, as in "The Songs of Chu·Nine Chapters·Sorrowful Return to the Wind": "The heart is fettered but not open, but the heart is dazzled and self-confessed."

" Concluding " can also be extended to construction and contracting. The former is like "The Three Songs and Dances of Liang Yin: The King of Ming": "Being clever with the sun and the moon, the saintly respects the area." The words "construct" and "create" commonly used today also come from the meaning of "build." The meaning of "concluding" can be found in the "New Tang Book", such as "New Tang Book: Zhang Xiaozhong's Biography": "Filial loyalty emphasizes virtue, for Zimao and hire his daughter, and make a contract for benefit."

" Date " is also used to ban and close. "Xiao Erya Guangyan": "Close, close."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of "糸" and " di ", the original meaning is that the knot cannot be solved.
humanum_full_description:
從「糸」，「帝」聲，本義為結解不開。「締」不見於甲金文，《說文》：

　　「結不解也。从糸，帝聲。」段玉裁注：「解者，判也。下文曰：『紐，結而可解也。』故結而不可解者曰締。」

　　「締」可引申為鬱結，如《楚辭·九章·悲回風》：「心鞿羈而不開兮，心氣繚轉而自締」。

　　「締」也可引申為建造、訂立。前者如〈梁鞞歌舞三首·明之君〉：「機靈通日月，聖敬締區宇。」今天常用的「締構」、「締造」等詞，也是來自「建造」之義。「訂立」義見於《新唐書》，如《新唐書·張孝忠傳》：「孝忠重德滔，為子茂和聘其女，締約益堅。」

　　「締」也用作取締，關閉。《小爾雅·廣言》：「締，閉也。」
humanum_short_description: 從「糸」，「帝」聲，本義為結解不開。

從「 糸 」，「 帝 」聲，本義為結解不開。「 締 」不見於甲金文，《說文》： 「結不解也。从糸，帝聲。」段玉裁注：「解者，判也。下文曰：『紐，結而可解也。』故結而不可解者曰締。」 「 締 」可引申為鬱結，如《楚辭·九章·悲回風》：「心鞿羈而不開兮，心氣繚轉而自締」。 「 締 」也可引申為建造、訂立。前者如〈梁鞞歌舞三首·明之君〉：「機靈通日月，聖敬締區宇。」今天常用的「締構」、「締造」等詞，也是來自「建造」之義。「訂立」義見於《新唐書》，如《新唐書·張孝忠傳》：「孝忠重德滔，為子茂和聘其女，締約益堅。」 「 締 」也用作取締，關閉。《小爾雅·廣言》：「締，閉也。」
From the sound of " 糸" and " di", the original meaning is that the knot cannot be solved. " Confidential" is not seen in Jia Jinwen, "Shu Wen": "The knot is incomprehensible. From Shito, the emperor's voice." Duan Yucai's note: "The one who solves, the sentence is also. The following said: "New, knot and unsolvable." Therefore, the knot is insoluble, so it is concluded." " Dissociation" can be extended to mean depression, as in "The Songs of Chu·Nine Chapters·Sorrowful Return to the Wind": "The heart is fettered but not open, but the heart is dazzled and self-confessed." " Concluding" can also be extended to construction and contracting. The former is like "The Three Songs and Dances of Liang Yin: The King of Ming": "Being clever with the sun and the moon, the saintly respects the area." The words "construct" and "create" commonly used today also come from the meaning of "build." The meaning of "concluding" can be found in the "New Tang Book", such as "New Tang Book: Zhang Xiaozhong's Biography": "Filial loyalty emphasizes virtue, for Zimao and hire his daughter, and make a contract for benefit." " Date" is also used to ban and close. "Xiao Erya Guangyan": "Close, close."

締字的基本解释

締
dì
见“缔”。

締字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dì］
［《廣韻》特計切，去霽，定。］
［《廣韻》杜奚切，平齊，定。］
“缔1”的繁体字。
(1)郁结；牢结。
(2)结合；交结。
(3)订立。
(4)构造，建造。参见“締構”。
(5)约束；限制。

締字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　締； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页930第14
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?特計切，音弟。【說文】結不解也。【史記·秦始皇本紀】合從締交。【註】締，結也。　又【小爾雅】締，閉也。　又杜奚切，音題。【楚辭·九章】氣繚轉而自締。　又【集韻】丁計切，音帝。徒二切，音地。丈尒切，音豸。義?同。

締字的源字形

小篆楷体

暂无。

Name meaning

dì
вм. 缔
Radicals: 糸, 立, 巾  (thread, stand, towel)
Meaning Mnemonic
You have a special thread in your towel you can use to make it stand up by tightening it.
Imagine pulling this thread and watch as your towel tightens and goes rigid, standing up almost completely on its own (except that the thread did it).
Reading Mnemonic
You tighten your towel before you eat tater (てい) tots every night. That way it stands up nice and straight next to your eating chair, ready for all that delicious tater tot grease that gets on your fingers.
A tightened towel stands up for easy grease cleanup. No wiping on your pants, no dripping on the floor.
